content.en: AI-assisted diagnosis: A set of scientific studies have explored the use of algorithms in improving the detection and assessment of coronary artery disease. These algorithms, based on CT scans and other imaging techniques, have shown promising results in accurately identifying significant stenoses and determining the need for revascularization. They have the potential to reduce the number of invasive procedures and provide more efficient point-of-care assessment for patients.
content.da: AI-assisteret diagnose: En række videnskabelige studier har udforsket brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre detektion og vurdering af koronararteriesygdom. Disse algoritmer, baseret på CT-scanninger og andre billeddannelsesteknikker, har vist lovende resultater med præcist at identificere betydelige stenoser og bestemme behovet for revaskularisering. De har potentiale til at reducere antallet af invasive procedurer og give en mere effektiv point-of-care vurdering for patienter.
